title: The Favorite Sister
description: The story of the downfall of Robert Devereux, Earl of Essex. The story of Essex's last five years of triumph and disaster greatly affected his much loved sister Penelope Rich. Forced intoa legal marriage but bound by a youthful betrothal to the man she really loved, Essex had protected Penelope from the consequences of a scandal. But as Essex plunged into the political quagmire, Penelope's devotion to him fore-shadowed a terrible climax.
author: Sheila Bishop
